title: Oakland Athletics average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is moderately positive which exists from 2016 to 2011.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2011 to 2008.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2019 to 2016.
But, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008 to 2006.
gold: This graph depicts the average ticket price for Oakland Athletics games in Major League Baseball from 2006 to 2019 . In 2019 , the average ticket price was at 24.30 U.S. dollars .
